abstract: New York City will offer prizes, including dinner with the mayor, to developers who come up with creative applications that tap into city data such as property records and restaurant inspections.
snippet: New York City will offer prizes, including dinner with the mayor, to developers who come up with creative applications that tap into city data such as property records and restaurant inspections.
lead_paragraph: The winners don’t get a million-dollar Netflix Prize, but, hey, it’s dinner with a billionaire. From our colleagues at City Room:

headline.main: New York City Starts Contest for Big Apple Apps

byline.original: By Sewell Chan and Patrick McGeehan
